metadata.Title: CVE-2015-7882 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Improper handling of LDAP authentication in MongoDB Server versions 3.0.0 to 3.0.6 allows an unauthenticated client to gain unauthorized access.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-7882` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mongodb - 1:3.6.3-0ubuntu1.1
mongodb-clients - 1:3.6.3-0ubuntu1.1
mongodb-server - 1:3.6.3-0ubuntu1.1
mongodb-server-core - 1:3.6.3-0ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mongodb package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:3.6.3-0ubuntu1.1').
